title: Looking for D3+ players for OOL
body:
As the title says I'm looking for players for a high ranking team to enter the OOL. We currently have:

Top - Open
Mid - Dia 3 (Taken)
Jungle - Challenger (Taken)
Adc - Open
Support - Dia 2 (Taken)

I would prefer higher ranks but anything over Diamond III will be acknowledged. Please leave your rank in a comment and I'll add you in game if you can fulfill the roles needed.

replies.body:
Hello, I am very interested in this prospect. I am currently Diamond V, however I truly do feel like I can play to the level that you need. Since ADC is open I'd like to fill that position. 
My best ADC champs include: Vayne, Lucian, Twitch (situational), Caitlyn, Ashe and Tristana, but I do pick and play well on the other ADCs such as Sivir, Corki.
So, by all means, if you still need someone and you want a player who will be committed and ready to challenge themselves then allow me to be your ADC. 
My IGN is: EternalEmVy
